name: ALDUB Run - ALDUB Game
description:
Over 25,000 downloads on iTunes App Store, Google Play Store, and Amazon App Store...

----------------------------------------------------------------

AlDub RUN is an endless running game.

Save Yaya Dub from the Rogelios and Lola Nidora.

Collect all the gifts like flowers, isaw, button and avoid different obstacles.

HOW TO PLAY:
1) Tap on the play button to start the game.
2) Collect all the gifts
3) Avoid Lola Nidora, Rogelios, and Quandios
4) Press left or right button to move forwards or backwards.
5) Beat your best score.

Nice sounds and enjoy the game ALDUB NATIONS!!!
